What am I doing?

I’m currently living in the mega metropolis Lagos, where I’ve started a live music revolution called Kilonsele. It’s all about playing an insane amount of concerts for local communities, thereby making live music accesible to the people. We also provide team work music training for young local talents, who will be the backbone of sustaining the project once I get too old to play 2 million concerts a year.

Find out more about Kilonsele on our website: kilonsele.com. Some pictures from our recent ventures:
